accents: Hints of subtle blue edge refractions

materialsAndTextures.description: Smooth, thick, and slightly distorted surface resembling molten glass or resin, glowing from within
Intense, fiery inner glow that radiates through the transparent form, creating soft illumination and hot edges
Tiny light-reflective imperfections scattered across the glass for depth and realism

lightingAndShadows.description: High-contrast lighting with internal illumination; external lighting is minimal to highlight the glow
lightingAndShadows.effect: Emphasizes edges and contours with radiant highlights while allowing dark areas to fade into the black background

keyAttributes: High-emphasis on light play and internal glow
